title: (x) JACK in the BOX LOGO - Frankfurter {Chesh}
content:
I know this is custom, but is there anything   
similar...   
   
VAG Rounded Extra Black?   
   
 [http://www.jackinthebox.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131127055627/http:/www.jackinthebox.com/)
author: beejay

comments.content:
this logo, the one with the OX fish ligature.   
   
 ![jack.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131127055627im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/7290.jpg)
Looks like a modified [Frankfurter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131127055627/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/frankfurter/). Looks like they inverted the U for an N.
That is the best site, isn't it? It's amazing what they have there. That's how I found the "Canada Bread" logo yesteday. Some of the Coca-Cola eps files are fantastic.

Oops. I already bought it. But the download works, too, thanks.   
For the project I'm doing, they wanted the   
"fat jack in the box" font. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131127055627im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
bj

Before you redraw or recreate it, you might want to check out these two links:   
   
 [http://www.logo.nino.ru/main/?id=32240&query\_id=63569&page=6](http://web.archive.org/web/20131127055627/http:/www.logo.nino.ru/main/?id=32240&query_id=63569&page=6)   
   
 [http://www.logo.nino.ru/main/?id=4336&query\_id=63569&page=6](http://web.archive.org/web/20131127055627/http:/www.logo.nino.ru/main/?id=4336&query_id=63569&page=6)
